articles.description: Central bank will purchase securities maturing in 2025, 2029 and 2033, and sell short-dated securities maturing in November this year and February 2022
articles.content: The Reserve Bank of India (RBI) Monday said it will simultaneously sell and purchase government securities (G-Secs) worth 10,000 crore under open market operations (OMOs) on 25 February. Typically, t… [+1966 chars]

articles.author: Business Insider India
articles.title: WPI inflation rises 2% in January— at its highest since February 2020 - Business Insider India
articles.description: New Delhi, India's annual rate of inflation based on wholesale prices sequentially rose to 2.03 per cent in January from a rise of 1.22 per cent in December.
articles.content:

articles.title: KYC holds up EPF interest for 4 mn - Mint
articles.description: EPFO blames mismatch in employees’ KYC data at employers’ end for delay and says its field offices are reaching out to the establishments
